title: Error with purchase of Riot points(need a rioter)
body:

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that your ticket was successfully received.  It will be reviewed by our billing team as soon as possible, but keep in mind that replying to your ticket before then can cause delays by dropping you back to the bottom of the queue.  Hang on until a Billing specialist responds to your ticket!

Okay, Thanks!
can I know the time , before i get tempo bann for this?
